data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes of the Neotropical alderfly genus Ilyobius Enderlein, 1910 (Megaloptera, Sialidae), with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xingyue, Hayashi, Fumio, Yang, Ding (2015): Taxonomic notes of the Neotropical alderfly genus Ilyobius Enderlein, 1910 (Megaloptera, Sialidae), with description of a new species. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 62 (1): 55-63, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.62.4481, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.62.4481
